urls.title: Dangerous goods | easyJet
urls.description: Dangerous goods are articles or substances which are capable of posing a risk to health, safety, property or the environment when transported by air. easyJet does not transport dangerous goods on any of its aircraft except as outlined below. that can only be taken in cabin baggage, have to be kept in hold baggage, are not permitted for transport. Oxygen or air, gaseous, small cylinders required for medical use. The cylinder must not exceed 5 kg gross weight. ✓ Liquid Oxygen – Units containing refrigerated
